response.original_title: ➽ US-1-855-535-4580 ➽ Why is TotalAV slowing down my computer?
response.overview: ➽ US-1-855-535-4580 ➽ If you’ve noticed reduced system performance, high CPU usage, longer boot times, or lag while browsing after installing TotalAV antivirus, several technical factors could be affecting your device — and for advanced troubleshooting you can contact ➽ US-1-855-535-4580 ➽ for real-time support. ➽ US-1-855-535-4580 ➽ One common reason is that a full system scan may be running in the background, consuming RAM and processor resources while checking for malware, ransomware threats, spyware, or potentially unwanted programs. ➽ US-1-855-535-4580 ➽ Real-time protection features such as WebShield, firewall monitoring, VPN encryption, and automatic updates can also temporarily increase CPU or disk usage, especially on older computers with limited memory or storage capacity.
response.title: ➽ US-1-855-535-4580 ➽ Why is TotalAV slowing down my computer?
